# Analysis

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(pkgsearch)
library(jsonlite)
```

```{r readcran}
url <- "http://cran.rstudio.com/web/packages/packages.rds"
db <- readRDS(url(url)) %>% 
  as.data.frame()
```

```{r}
# to find the top 15 downloaded packages
db1 <- db %>%
  group_by(Package) %>%
  mutate(Package = as.numeric(Package)) %>%
  summarise(total = sum(Package))

```

```{r  top15pkg-ld}
resp <- curl::curl_fetch_memory("http://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/top/last-day/15")
cnt <- rawToChar(resp$content)
Encoding(cnt) <- "UTF-8"
tb <- fromJSON(cnt, simplifyDataFrame = TRUE)$downloads
names(tb) <- c("package", "count")
  
cran_top15_downloaded_ld <- tibble::as_tibble(tb)
```

```{r top15ld-plot}
cran_top15_downloaded_ld <- cran_top15_downloaded_ld %>%
  arrange(count) 

cran_top15_downloaded_ld$package <- as.vector(cran_top15_downloaded_ld$package) #get rid of factors
cran_top15_downloaded_ld$package = factor(cran_top15_downloaded_ld$package,cran_top15_downloaded_ld$package) #add ordered factors back

  ggplot(data = cran_top15_downloaded_ld) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", aes(x = package, y = count)) +
  #scale_x_discrete(limits = c("rlang", "lifecycle", "vctrs","dplyr","ggplot2","jsonlite","tibble","pillar","glue","sf","magrittr","xfun","withr","tidyselect","cli")) +
  labs(
       title = "Top 15 downloaded packages last day") +
  theme_minimal()  +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank()) +
  theme(
  axis.text=element_text(size=10),
  axis.title=element_text(size=12,face="bold"),
  axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 55, hjust = 1))
```
